prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar are the instruments featured in this song, but Organ is absent.

Style 2: This song is composed of Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, but Organ is not included.

Style 3: This composition is comprised of Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, with no Organ.
